title: Agaron akron
description: A promontory of the northern shore of the Azov Sea, included in Ptolemy's gazetteer. It is perhaps to be associated with the promontory that now extends into the sea near modern Berdyansk.

properties.description: Representative point for associated modern location based on point location for the Nizhniy Berdyanskiy lighthouse derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Berdyansk promontory
